programme.title: Sparkle
programme.desc: The demands of success take their toll on three Harlem sisters who reach the heights of musical stardom in the 1950s.

programme.title: Cleopatra Jones
programme.desc: Federal agent Jones (Tamara Dobson) tries to rescue her framed boyfriend (Bernie Casey) from a drug-queen pervert known as Mommy (Shelley Winters).

programme.title: Cleopatra Jones and the Casino of Gold
programme.desc: Federal agent Jones (Tamara Dobson), trained in martial arts, routs a drug-dealing dragon lady (Stella Stevens) from her Macao gambling den.

programme.title: Jazz Session at the Blue Note With Chaka Khan
programme.sub-title: Jazz Session at the Blue Note With Chaka Khan
programme.desc: Recorded in 1993 at the Blue Note Jazz Club in New York City, this performance by Chaka Khan features a number of songs closely associated with jazz.

programme.title: The Big Doll House
programme.desc: Women (Judy Brown, Pam Grier, Roberta Collins) in pastel dresses plot an escape from a tropical island prison run by perverts.

programme.title: The Big Bird Cage
programme.desc: Women rebel against slave labor in a filthy jungle prison where they feed sugar cane to a mechanical maw.

programme.title: Impulse
programme.desc: A teenager (Kim Nicholas) is suspicious of a charming stranger (William Shatner) who's romancing her widowed mother (Jennifer Bishop).

programme.title: The New Barbarians
programme.desc: Two loners (Timothy Brent, Fred Williamson) protect pilgrims from a post-World War III gang of leather-clad barbarians.

programme.title: Coming Soon to Soul Flix
programme.desc: "Coming To Soul Flix" features "Arena," "The Big Doll House," "Caged Heat," "Assault on Precinct 13," "The Bad Bunch" and others.

programme.title: Coming Soon to Soul Flix
programme.desc: "Coming To Soul Flix" features "Arena," "The Big Doll House," "Caged Heat," "Assault on Precinct 13," "The Bad Bunch" and others.

programme.title: Crazy Six
programme.desc: A turf war erupts in a futuristic, anarchistic Europe between rival crime families supplying weapons.

programme.title: Hangin' With the Homeboys
programme.desc: Willie (Doug E. Doug), Tom (Mario Joyner), Johnny (John Leguizamo) and Vinny are fast-talkers from the South Bronx looking for a party.

programme.title: Fear of a Black Hat
programme.desc: A student researching her doctoral thesis joins an eccentric group of rap musicians (Larry B. Scott, Mark Christopher Lawrence, Rusty Cundieff) on tour.

programme.title: Norman... Is That You?
programme.desc: Parents (Redd Foxx, Pearl Bailey) discover their son is gay and lives in Hollywood with his white lover (Dennis Dugan).

programme.title: Uptown Saturday Night
programme.desc: Blue-collar buddies (Sidney Poitier, Bill Cosby) search the underworld for a winning lottery ticket lost in a nightclub holdup.

programme.title: Dummy
programme.desc: A court-appointed lawyer (Paul Sorvino) who cannot hear defends a young murder suspect (LeVar Burton) who cannot hear or speak.

programme.title: Brothers
programme.desc: An innocent black youth succumbs to the brutalities of prison after being duped into pleading guilty to robbery.
